name: Out of the Mist
description:
Out of the Mist is a game where you master a unique control scheme. Instead of controlling the character directly, manipulate the environment to your advantage. Learn to navigate challenging platforming sections to reach the heart of this realm. Can you conquer the obstacles and unravel the mysteries hidden within the mist?

Traverse atmospheric landscapes

Embark on journey where you traverse captivating environments while trying to reach the golden throne. Immerse yourself in stunning visuals and a mesmerizing soundscape as you strive to reach your goal.


Master the environment

You don’t control your character, but rather the environment around him. Learn how to use this to your advantage to achieve your goals and master challenging platforming in order to get to the golden throne!
